document.full_text: the european central bank is putting the finishing touches on a new facility that will give troubled euro zone banks liquidity over a longer time frame, throwing a lifeline to ireland's ailing banks.
document.title: ecb close to liquidity deal for troubled banks: source
lines_and_colors: the european central bank is putting the finishing touches on a new facility that will give troubled euro zone banks liquidity over a longer time frame, throwing a lifeline to ireland's ailing banks.
